title: Drawing, "Drapery (study for oil painting, "Wedding Procession", or "the Dance")", ca. 1872–79
medium: black, red, white chalk on salmon-pink wove paper
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
creditline: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
description: Vertical rectangle. Study of the drapery of a woman's skirt, seen from the back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drapery (study for oil painting, "Wedding Procession", or "the Dance")", ca. 1872–79.
ca. 1872–79. black, red, white chalk on salmon-pink wove paper. Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters. 1955-38-40.
